channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Supreme Court rejects IVF clinic’s appeal of Alabama frozen embryo ruling
item.description: The U.S. Supreme Court has declined to review an Alabama ruling that triggered concerns for in vitro fertilization services in the state.

item.title: Oregon strikes an additional 302 people from voter rolls over lack of citizenship proof
item.description: Oregon authorities say they’ve removed another 302 people from the state’s voter rolls after determining they didn’t provide proof of citizenship when they were registered to vote.

item.title: Harris calls Trump ‘incredibly irresponsible’ for spreading misinformation about Helene response
item.description: Vice President Kamala Harris is calling former President Donald Trump “incredibly irresponsible” for spreading falsehoods about the federal response to Hurricane Helene’s destruction.
